mapper.select: select board.title as title, user.no as user_no, user.name as user_name, board.hit as hit, date_format(board.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as reg_date, board.depth as depth, board.contents as contents, board.no as no, board.status as status from board, user where board.user_no = user.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc Limit 0, 5
select title, contents, hit, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s'), depth, o_no, g_no, from board where no=#{no } -
mapper.insert: insert into board values(null, #{title }, #{contents }, 0, now(), (select ifnull(max(b.g_no)+1,1) from board as b), 1, 0, #{user_no }, true)
